TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance being studied for its ability to prevent damage to normal tissue caused by radiation therapy. It is a type of antioxidant.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "IH636 grape seed extract"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "extracto de semilla de uva IH636"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: extracto de semilla de uva IH636

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia en estudio por su capacidad de prevenir el daño que causa la radioterapia al tejido normal. Es un tipo de antioxidante.
